titles.title: Member of Congress Pay Sequestration and Fairness Act

To amend part C of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to include the pay of Members of Congress within the coverage of the provisions of such Act which provide for budget enforcement through sequestration.
Member of Congress Pay Sequestration and Fairness Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: Member of Congress Pay Sequestration and Fairness Act - Amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) to include any item for the pay of Members of Congress within the definition of accounts subject to budget enforcement through sequestration.
